name: Icon Graphix Computer Aided Design
overview: Icon Graphix turns your 48K Spectrum into a powerful icon-driven graphics and design tool. Use it to draw full colour hi-res screens which can be saved to tape or microdrive. Or use it in your hobby as a Computer Aided Design tool for, say, circuit design. Icon Graphix gives you loads of facilities for automatically drawing lines, circles, ovals, boxes; ZX printer hard-copy; a magnify facility for detailed work; a choice of pen and brush sizes; even a spraycan option! A variety of pattern designs are also included which can be edited into your own custom patterns. So get drawing - the only limit is your imagination!
